trans-unit.source: Represents a control that contains multiple items that share the same space on the screen.
The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl> is useful for minimizing screen space usage while allowing an application to expose a large amount of data.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl> é útil para minimizar o uso de espaço de tela enquanto permite que um aplicativo para expor uma grande quantidade de dados.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl> consists of multiple <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem> objects that share the same screen space.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl> consiste em vários <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem> objetos que compartilham o mesmo espaço de tela.

trans-unit.source: Only one <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem> in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl> is visible at a time.
trans-unit.target: Apenas uma <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem> em um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl> é visível no momento.

trans-unit.source: When a user selects the tab of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem>, the contents of that <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem> become visible and the contents of the other <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem> objects are hidden.
trans-unit.target: Quando um usuário seleciona a guia de um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem>, o conteúdo de que <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem> se tornarão visíveis e o conteúdo de outro <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem> objetos ficam ocultos.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl> is an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>, which means it can contain a collection of objects of any type (such as string, image, or panel).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl> é um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>, que significa que ele pode conter uma coleção de objetos de qualquer tipo (como cadeia de caracteres, imagem ou painel).

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> class.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte a classe <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>.

trans-unit.source: Customizing the TabControl Control
trans-unit.target: Personalizando o controle TabControl

trans-unit.source: To apply the same property settings to multiple <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl> controls, use the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para aplicar as mesmas configurações de propriedade a vários <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl> controles, use o <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: You can modify the default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> to give the control a unique appearance.
trans-unit.target: Você pode modificar o padrão <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> para que o controle uma aparência exclusiva.

trans-unit.source: For more information about creating a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como criar um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, consulte [Personalizando a aparência de um controle existente, criando um ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md).

trans-unit.source: To see the parts and states that are specific to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl>, see [TabControl Styles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/tabcontrol-styles-and-templates.md).
trans-unit.target: Para ver as partes e os estados que são específicos para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl>, consulte [TabControl estilos e modelos](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/tabcontrol-styles-and-templates.md).

trans-unit.source: Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style.
trans-unit.target: Propriedades de dependência para este controle podem ser definidas pelo estilo padrão do controle.

trans-unit.source: If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application.
trans-unit.target: Se uma propriedade é definida por um estilo padrão, a propriedade pode ser alterada de seu valor padrão quando o controle é exibido no aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running.
trans-unit.target: O estilo padrão é determinado pelo qual tema de área de trabalho é usado quando o aplicativo está em execução.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [padrão WPF temas](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).

trans-unit.source: Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl> control's default template and is set by using a .
trans-unit.target: Definir uma propriedade visual só terá efeito se essa propriedade estiver presente em ambos <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl> controle do modelo padrão e é definido usando um.

trans-unit.source: You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md).
trans-unit.target: Você pode encontrar uma lista de propriedades visuais na seção "Alterando o Visual estrutura de um controle de" [Personalizando a aparência de um controle existente, criando um ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md).

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl> and binds the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock> in the second <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem> to a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> in the first <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir cria um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl> e associa o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock> no segundo <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem> para um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> na primeira <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl" />.class.
Gets a composite string that specifies how to format the contents of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem" /> objects if they are displayed as strings.
A composite string that specifies how to format the contents of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem" /> objects if they are displayed as strings.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres composta que especifica como formatar o conteúdo do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem" /> objetos se eles são exibidos como cadeias de caracteres.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.ContentStringFormat%2A> can be a predefined, composite, or custom string format.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.ContentStringFormat%2A> pode ser um formato de cadeia de caracteres predefinidas, composto ou personalizadas.

trans-unit.source: For more information about string formats, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre formatos de cadeia de caracteres, consulte [tipos de formatação](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md).

trans-unit.source: If you set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.ContentTemplate%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.ContentTemplateSelector%2A> of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl>, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.ContentStringFormat%2A> property is ignored.
trans-unit.target: Se você definir o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.ContentTemplate%2A> ou <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.ContentTemplateSelector%2A> de um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl>, o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.ContentStringFormat%2A> propriedade será ignorada.

trans-unit.source: The following example binds a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl> to a collection of `Student` objects.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir associa um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl> em uma coleção de `Student` objetos.

trans-unit.source: The `Student` class has a `Name` property, a collection of `Course` objects, and implements the <xref:System.IFormattable.ToString%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to return either the `Name` of the student or a string that lists the student's courses.
trans-unit.target: O `Student` classe tiver um `Name` propriedade, uma coleção de `Course` objetos e implementa o <xref:System.IFormattable.ToString%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> método para retornar o `Name` do aluno ou uma cadeia de caracteres que lista os cursos de student.

trans-unit.source: The example uses <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.HeaderStringFormat%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> to put a student's name in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header%2A> of each <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem> (which inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl>), and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.ContentStringFormat%2A> to display the course list for each student in the Content of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo usa <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.HeaderStringFormat%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> para colocar o nome de um aluno no <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header%2A> de cada <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem> (que herda de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl>) e o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.ContentStringFormat%2A> para exibir a lista para o conteúdo de cada aluno o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem>.

trans-unit.source: The following example implements the <xref:System.IFormattable.ToString%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to return either the `Name` of the student or a string that lists the student's courses.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir implementa a <xref:System.IFormattable.ToString%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> método para retornar o `Name` do aluno ou uma cadeia de caracteres que lista os cursos de student.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.ContentStringFormat" /> dependency property.

Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.DataTemplate" /> to apply to any <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem" /> that does not have a <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplate" /> or <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplateSelector" /> property defined.

The <see cref="T:System.Windows.DataTemplate" /> to apply to any <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem" /> that does not have a <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplate" /> or <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplateSelector" /> property defined.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.DataTemplate" /> a ser aplicado a qualquer <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem" /> que não tem uma propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplate" /> ou <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplateSelector" /> definida.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
trans-unit.target: Uso do Atributo XAML

trans-unit.source: XAML Property Element Usage
trans-unit.target: Uso do elemento propriedade XAML

trans-unit.source: XAML Values
trans-unit.target: Valores XAML

trans-unit.source: *ResourceExtension*
trans-unit.target: *ResourceExtension*

trans-unit.source: One of the following: `StaticResource`, or `DynamicResource`.
trans-unit.target: Um dos seguintes: `StaticResource`, ou `DynamicResource`.

trans-unit.source: See [XAML Resources](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md).
trans-unit.target: Consulte [recursos XAML](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md).

trans-unit.source: *TemplateResourceKey*
trans-unit.target: *TemplateResourceKey*

trans-unit.source: The key that identifies the template being requested.
trans-unit.target: A chave que identifica o modelo que está sendo solicitado.

trans-unit.source: The key refers to an existing resource in a <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>.
trans-unit.target: A chave refere-se a um recurso existente em um <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>.

trans-unit.source: Property element syntax is technically possible, but not recommended.
trans-unit.target: Sintaxe de elemento de propriedade é tecnicamente possível, mas não é recomendado.

trans-unit.source: See [Inline Styles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/inline-styles-and-templates.md).
trans-unit.target: Consulte [modelos e estilos in-line](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/inline-styles-and-templates.md).

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: Informações da propriedade de dependência

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: Campo de identificador

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: Propriedades de metadados é definido como `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: Nenhum

trans-unit.source: The following example creates two <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> objects.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir cria dois <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> objetos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> called `contentTemplate` is assigned to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.ContentTemplate%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl> and the <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> called `tabItemTemplate` is assigned to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplate%2A> of the second <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> chamado `contentTemplate` é atribuído para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.ContentTemplate%2A> do <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl> e o <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> chamado `tabItemTemplate` é atribuído ao <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplate%2A> da segunda <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem>.

trans-unit.source: All <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem> objects contain the white rectangle defined in `contentTemplate`, except the second <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem>, which has a gray rectangle, as defined in `tabItemTemplate`.
trans-unit.target: Todos os <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem> objetos contêm o retângulo branco definido em `contentTemplate`, exceto o segundo <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem>, que tem um retângulo cinza, conforme definido em `tabItemTemplate`.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.ContentTemplate" /> dependency property.
Gets or sets a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector" /> that provides custom logic for choosing the template that is used to display the content of the control.
A <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.ContentTemplateSelector" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.ContentTemplateSelector" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Typically, you create a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector> when you have more than one <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> for the same type of objects and you want to supply your own logic to choose a <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> to apply based on the properties of each data object.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, você cria um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector> quando há mais de um <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> para o mesmo tipo de objetos e você deseja fornecer sua própria lógica para escolher um <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> aplicar com base nas propriedades de cada objeto de dados.

trans-unit.source: Note that if you have objects of different types, you can set the <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate.DataType%2A> property on the <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>.
trans-unit.target: Observe que se você tiver objetos de tipos diferentes, você pode definir o <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate.DataType%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>.

trans-unit.source: If you do that, then there is no need to create a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector>.
trans-unit.target: Se você fizer isso, não é necessário para criar um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector>.

trans-unit.source: Furthermore, if you have objects of the same type but with different properties, you can also consider using a <xref:System.Windows.DataTrigger> or a data converter.
trans-unit.target: Além disso, se você tiver objetos do mesmo tipo, mas com propriedades diferentes, você também pode considerar usando um <xref:System.Windows.DataTrigger> ou um conversor de dados.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Data Templating Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [Visão geral de modelagem de dados](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview.md).

trans-unit.source: To create a template selector, create a class that inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector> and override the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector.SelectTemplate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para criar um seletor de modelo, crie uma classe que herda de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector> e substituir o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector.SelectTemplate%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: After your class is defined, you can assign an instance of the class to the template selector property of your element.
trans-unit.target: Após a definição de sua classe, você pode atribuir uma instância da classe para a propriedade de seletor de modelo do seu elemento.

trans-unit.source: If both the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.ContentTemplateSelector%2A> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.ContentTemplate%2A> properties are set, then this property is ignored.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.ContentTemplateSelector%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.ContentTemplate%2A> propriedades são definidas e, em seguida, essa propriedade será ignorada.

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
trans-unit.target: Uso do Atributo XAML

trans-unit.source: XAML Property Element Usage
trans-unit.target: Uso do elemento propriedade XAML

trans-unit.source: XAML Values
trans-unit.target: Valores XAML

trans-unit.source: *ResourceExtension*
trans-unit.target: *ResourceExtension*

trans-unit.source: One of the following: `StaticResource`, or `DynamicResource`.
trans-unit.target: Um dos seguintes: `StaticResource`, ou `DynamicResource`.

trans-unit.source: See [XAML Resources](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md).
trans-unit.target: Consulte [recursos XAML](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md).

trans-unit.source: *DataTemplateSelectorClassKey*
trans-unit.target: *DataTemplateSelectorClassKey*

trans-unit.source: The key that identifies the selector implementation being requested.
trans-unit.target: A chave que identifica a implementação do seletor que está sendo solicitada.

trans-unit.source: The key refers to a derived class that implements a practical <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector.SelectTemplate%2A> override.
trans-unit.target: A chave refere-se a uma classe derivada que implementa um práticos <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector.SelectTemplate%2A> substituir.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to map your custom class, see [XAML Namespaces and Namespace Mapping for WPF XAML](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre como mapear sua classe personalizada, consulte [Namespaces XAML e o mapeamento de Namespace para WPF XAML](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml.md).

trans-unit.source: You can also programmatically add an instance of your <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector> class as a resource to a resource dictionary.
trans-unit.target: Também por meio de programação, você pode adicionar uma instância do seu <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector> classe como um recurso para um dicionário de recursos.

trans-unit.source: *MyDataTemplateSelectorImplementation*
trans-unit.target: *MyDataTemplateSelectorImplementation*

trans-unit.source: A class derived from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector> and overrides <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector.SelectTemplate%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Uma classe derivada de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector> e substituições <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector.SelectTemplate%2A>.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to map your custom class, see [XAML Namespaces and Namespace Mapping for WPF XAML](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre como mapear sua classe personalizada, consulte [Namespaces XAML e o mapeamento de Namespace para WPF XAML](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml.md).

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: Informações da propriedade de dependência

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: Campo de identificador

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: Propriedades de metadados é definido como `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: Nenhum

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.ContentTemplateSelector%2A> property to display the content of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem> differently, depending on the hometown of the selected person.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir usa o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.ContentTemplateSelector%2A> propriedade para exibir o conteúdo de um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem> diferente, dependendo da cidade natal da pessoa que está selecionada.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.ContentTemplateSelector" /> dependency property.
Creates or identifies the element used to display the specified item.
The element used to display the specified item.
Specified item.
Determines if the specified item is (or is eligible to be) its own <see langword="ItemContainer" />.
Returns <see langword="true" /> if the item is its own <see langword="ItemContainer" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
Called when <see cref="M:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ApplyTemplate" /> is called.

This method updates the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.SelectedContent%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.SelectedContentTemplate%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.SelectedContentTemplateSelector%2A> properties to the objects used by the currently selected <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem>.
trans-unit.target: Este método atualizará o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.SelectedContent%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.SelectedContentTemplate%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.SelectedContentTemplateSelector%2A> propriedades para os objetos usados pelo selecionado no momento <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem>.

trans-unit.source: Provides an appropriate <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TabControlAutomationPeer" /> implementation for this control, as part of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] automation infrastructure.
The type-specific <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> implementation.
Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Initialized" /> event.
Called when <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.IsInitialized" /> is set to **true**.
The control raises the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.IsInitialized%2A> event by calling <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.RaiseEvent%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O controle gera o <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.IsInitialized%2A> evento chamando <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.RaiseEvent%2A>.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Routed Events Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [Visão geral de eventos roteados](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md).

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.OnInitialized(System.EventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.OnInitialized(System.EventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: Ao substituir <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.OnInitialized(System.EventArgs)" /> em uma classe derivada, certifique-se de chamar a classe base <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.OnInitialized(System.EventArgs)" /> método para que registrado delegados receber o evento.

trans-unit.source: The event data for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerGenerator.ItemsChanged" /> event.
Called to update the current selection when items change.
Provides data for <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs" />.
Provides class handling for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.ContentElement.KeyDown" /> routed event that occurs when the user presses a key.

This implementation marks the <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.KeyDown> event as handled by setting the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property of the event data to `true` when the user presses CTRL+TAB, CTRL+SHIFT+TAB, HOME, or END to navigate between <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem> objects.
trans-unit.target: Essa implementação marca o <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.KeyDown> eventos como manipulada, definindo o <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> propriedade dos dados do evento para `true` quando o usuário pressiona CTRL + TAB, CTRL + SHIFT + TAB, início ou final para navegar entre <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem> objetos.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, this implementation does not change the handled state (the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property) of the <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.KeyDown> event data.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, essa implementação não altera o estado manipulado (o <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> propriedade) da <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.KeyDown> dados de evento.

trans-unit.source: If you override <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.OnKeyDown(System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs)" />, always call the base implementation in your <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.OnKeyDown(System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs)" /> implementation.
trans-unit.target: Se você substituir <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.OnKeyDown(System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs)" />, sempre chamar a implementação base sua <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.OnKeyDown(System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs)" /> implementação.

trans-unit.source: Failure to call the base implementation prevents base classes from handling the event with a class handler, which might change the run-time behavior of the final class.
trans-unit.target: Falha ao chamar a implementação base impede que as classes base manipular o evento com um manipulador de classe, que pode alterar o comportamento de tempo de execução da classe final.

trans-unit.source: You can call the base implementation either before or after your special handling, depending on your requirements.
trans-unit.target: Você pode chamar a implementação base antes ou depois do tratamento especial, dependendo dos seus requisitos.

trans-unit.source: Provides data for <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.SelectionChangedEventArgs" />.
Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectionChanged" /> routed event.

The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl> updates the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.SelectedContent%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.SelectedContentTemplate%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.SelectedContentTemplateSelector%2A> properties to the objects used by the currently selected <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl> atualizações de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.SelectedContent%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.SelectedContentTemplate%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.SelectedContentTemplateSelector%2A> propriedades para os objetos usados pelo selecionado no momento <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem>.

trans-unit.source: The control raises the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectionChanged> event by calling <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.RaiseEvent%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O controle gera o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectionChanged> evento chamando <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.RaiseEvent%2A>.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Routed Events Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [Visão geral de eventos roteados](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md).

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.OnSelectionChanged(System.Windows.Controls.SelectionChangedEventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.OnSelectionChanged(System.Windows.Controls.SelectionChangedEventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: Ao substituir <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.OnSelectionChanged(System.Windows.Controls.SelectionChangedEventArgs)" /> em uma classe derivada, certifique-se de chamar a classe base <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.OnSelectionChanged(System.Windows.Controls.SelectionChangedEventArgs)" /> método para que registrado delegados receber o evento.

trans-unit.source: Gets the content of the currently selected <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem" />.
The content of the currently selected <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem" />.
trans-unit.target: O conteúdo do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem" /> selecionado no momento.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: This property is updated to reference the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> of the active <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem> when the tab selection changes.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade é atualizada a referência a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> de ativo <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem> quando a seleção de guia é alterada.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl> uses the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentSource%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to bind the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to this property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> do <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl> usa o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentSource%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade para associar o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade para essa propriedade.

trans-unit.source: If you create a new <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl>, be sure to the bind the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to this property by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentSource%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to "SelectedContent" or by using [TemplateBinding Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/templatebinding-markup-extension.md).
trans-unit.target: Se você criar um novo <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl>, certifique-se para a associação de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade para essa propriedade, definindo o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentSource%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade "SelectedContent" ou usando [extensão de marcação TemplateBinding](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/templatebinding-markup-extension.md).

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
trans-unit.target: Uso do Atributo XAML

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: Informações da propriedade de dependência

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: Campo de identificador

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: Propriedades de metadados é definido como `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: Nenhum

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.SelectedContent%2A> property to get the `Person` in the currently selected <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir usa o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.SelectedContent%2A> propriedade para obter o `Person` em selecionado no momento <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem>.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir cria um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl>.

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentSource%2A> property to "SelectedContent" creates aliases to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.SelectedContent%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.SelectedContentTemplate%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.SelectedContentTemplateSelector%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Definindo o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentSource%2A> propriedade como "SelectedContent" cria aliases para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.SelectedContent%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.SelectedContentTemplate%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.SelectedContentTemplateSelector%2A> propriedades.

trans-unit.source: The following example binds the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.SelectedContent%2A> property to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property by using the [TemplateBinding Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/templatebinding-markup-extension.md).
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir associa o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.SelectedContent%2A> propriedade para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade usando o [extensão de marcação TemplateBinding](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/templatebinding-markup-extension.md).

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.SelectedContent" /> dependency property.
Gets a composite string that specifies how to format the content of the currently selected <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem" /> if it is displayed as a string.
A composite string that specifies how to format the content of the currently selected <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem" /> if it is displayed as a string.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres composta que especifica como formatar o conteúdo selecionado no momento <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem" /> se ele é exibido como uma cadeia de caracteres.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.SelectedContentStringFormat" /> dependency property.
Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.DataTemplate" /> of the currently selected item.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.DataTemplate" /> of the selected item.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.DataTemplate" /> do item selecionado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl> updates this property to reference to the <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> for the active <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem> when the tab selection changes.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl> essa propriedade para fazer referência ao <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> para ativo <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem> quando a seleção de guia é alterada.

trans-unit.source: Set <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.ContentTemplate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplate%2A> property on a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem> to specify the <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem>.
trans-unit.target: Definir <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.ContentTemplate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> ou <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplate%2A> propriedade em uma <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem> para especificar o <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> para um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl> uses the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentSource%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to bind the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to this property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> do <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl> usa o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentSource%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade para associar o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade para essa propriedade.

trans-unit.source: If you create a new <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl>, be sure to the bind the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to this property by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentSource%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to "SelectedContent" or by using [TemplateBinding Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/templatebinding-markup-extension.md).
trans-unit.target: Se você criar um novo <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl>, certifique-se para a associação de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade para essa propriedade, definindo o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentSource%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade "SelectedContent" ou usando [extensão de marcação TemplateBinding](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/templatebinding-markup-extension.md).

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl>.

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentSource%2A> property to `"SelectedContent"` creates aliases to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.SelectedContent%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.SelectedContentTemplate%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.SelectedContentTemplateSelector%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Definindo o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentSource%2A> propriedade `"SelectedContent"` cria aliases para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.SelectedContent%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.SelectedContentTemplate%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.SelectedContentTemplateSelector%2A> propriedades.

trans-unit.source: The following example binds the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.SelectedContentTemplate%2A> property to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property by using the [TemplateBinding Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/templatebinding-markup-extension.md).
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir associa o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.SelectedContentTemplate%2A> propriedade para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade usando o [extensão de marcação TemplateBinding](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/templatebinding-markup-extension.md).

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.SelectedContentTemplate" /> dependency property.
Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector" /> of the currently selected item.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector" /> of the currently selected item.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector" /> do item atualmente selecionado.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl> updates this property to reference to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector> for the active <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem> when the tab selection changes.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl> essa propriedade para fazer referência ao <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector> para ativo <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem> quando a seleção de guia é alterada.

trans-unit.source: Set <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.ContentTemplateSelector%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplateSelector%2A> property on a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem> to specify the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector> for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem>.
trans-unit.target: Definir <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.ContentTemplateSelector%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> ou <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplateSelector%2A> propriedade em uma <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem> para especificar o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector> para um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl> uses the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentSource%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to bind the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to this property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> do <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl> usa o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentSource%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade para associar o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade para essa propriedade.

trans-unit.source: If you create a new <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl>, be sure to the bind the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to this property by setting <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentSource%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to "SelectedContent" or by using the [TemplateBinding Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/templatebinding-markup-extension.md).
trans-unit.target: Se você criar um novo <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl>, certifique-se para a associação de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade para essa propriedade, definindo <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentSource%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade "SelectedContent" ou usando o [extensão de marcação TemplateBinding](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/templatebinding-markup-extension.md).

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.SelectedContentTemplateSelector" /> dependency property.
Gets or sets how tab headers align relative to the tab content.
The alignment of tab headers relative to tab content.
trans-unit.target: O alinhamento dos cabeçalhos da guia em relação ao conteúdo da guia.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.Dock.Top" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.Dock.Top" />.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.TabStripPlacement" /> dependency property.
